import React from 'react'; let people = [ { id:1, name:"Gaurav" }, { id:2, name:"Rahul" }, { id:3, name:"Abhishek" }, { id:4, name:"Mohit" }, { id:5, name:"Ashish" }, ] const Chatlist = () => { const [open,setOpen] = React.useState(false) const [searchkey,setSearchkey] = React.useState('') const onchange = (e) => { if(e.target.value!==''){ setSearchkey(e.target.value) setOpen(true) }else{ setOpen(false) setSearchkey("") } } console.log(open) return
{ open ?
